meta.description: Determine the minimum cost to satisfy nutritional needs using six food options.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content per unit of each food

params.name: carbs
params.description: Carbohydrate content per unit of each food

params.name: calories
params.description: Calorie content per unit of each food

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost per unit of each food

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units of each food to purchase

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of purchasing food

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 58 grams of protein

constraints.name: carbs_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbs[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 150 grams of carbohydrates

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
